long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BigURL Pro is a helpful chrome extension for educators.

If you teach you know how difficult it can be for students to see your browser's URL from the back of the class. With this handy extension you can create an enlarged, high-contrast, readily accessible version of that URL that is easier for students to see. To use, simply visit a webpage and click on the extension icon. The enlarged URL should appear at the top of the screen and will stay in place as you scroll. Clicking a second time on the extension icon (or on the enlarged URL) causes the enlarged URL to disappear. 

BigURL Pro will properly display localhost as well as IP addresses, and works with both HTTP and HTTPS. BigURL Pro also displays search queries being passed in the URL. 

What's the difference between BigURL and BigURL Pro? With the Pro version of BigURL you gain the ability to modify the URL font size, as well as highlight and add/remove URL fragments. So instead of displaying "http:///some-url.com/?searchQuery" you can opt to hide the http protocol and search query and simply display "some-url.com". 

If you find a URL that the extension doesn't work with, please let me know!
